long_description: When hot weather hits, the Outdoor Research Transit Sombrero(TM) provides cool ventilation and excellent UPF protection to maximize comfort. Breathable cotton canvas fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful solar rays. Headband is soft next to skin and helps to manage moisture. Mesh side panels allow cooling airflow. Foam-stiffened brim is designed to float in water; floral screen print on the brim adds appeal. External drawcord adjustment at the back of the hat fine-tunes the fit. Removable chin strap secures the hat in windy conditions.
short_description: When hot weather hits, the Outdoor Research Transit Sombrero(TM) provides cool ventilation and excellent UPF protection to maximize comfort.
